snippet: Lt. Col. Jeffrey Krusinski, the officer in charge of sexual assault prevention programs for the Air Force, was arrested early Sunday and charged with sexual battery, the police said.
abstract: Police department in Arlington County, Va, say Lt Col Jeffrey Krusinski, officer in charge of sexual assault prevention programs for the Air Force, was arrested and charged with sexual battery; say Krusinski approached a woman in a parking lot, grabbing her breasts and buttocks before she fended him off and called 911.
lead_paragraph: Lt. Col. Jeffrey Krusinski, the officer in charge of sexual assault prevention programs for the Air Force, was arrested early Sunday and charged with sexual battery, the police said.

headline.seo: Air Force Officer Who Led Sexual Assault Prevention Efforts Arrested
headline.main: Assault-Prevention Officer in Air Force Is Arrested
headline.print_headline: Assault-Prevention Officer in Air Force Is Arrested

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
